name: Figure It Out (JoeColleyGames)
description:
Hello!

This game is a top down platformer in the early works.

The basic premise of the game is your movement changes constantly!

You start with WASD and if you hit the W hit, you will move up!

BUT, on release of the W key, the up movement will randomly change!

So the movement is WASD, but for example could be CASD!

I want to tweak the movement but want peoples opinion first.

Thanks,

Joe Colley
